1057     \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} ( val <= min )
1058     \{
1059         r = colors[0][0];
1060         g = colors[0][1];
1061         b = colors[0][2];
1062     \}
1063     \textcolor{keywordflow}{else} \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} ( val > max)
1064     \{
1065         r = colors[numColors-1][0];
1066         g = colors[numColors-1][1];
1067         b = colors[numColors-1][2];
1068     \}
1069     \textcolor{keywordflow}{else}
1070     \{   
1071         \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} floorj;
1072         \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} ceilj;
1073         \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} range = max - min;
1074         \textcolor{keywordflow}{for} (\textcolor{keywordtype}{int} j=0; j<numColors; j++)\{
1075             floorj = min + ((double)j/(numColors-1))*range;
1076             ceilj = min + ((double)(j+1)/(numColors-1))*range;
1077             \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (( val > floorj) && (val <= ceilj))\{
1078                 r = colors[j][0];
1079                 g = colors[j][1];
1080                 b = colors[j][2];
1081             \}
1082         \}
